narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Food Bank for Monterey County is a Meals provider based in Salinas, CA. From 2024-03 through 2024-11, this provider received $164K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 791 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.3× the national median for S9977 (S9977), at $66 per claim vs. the median of $20. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
100% of billing is concentrated in S9977 (S9977), indicating significant specialization in this service.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.
